wiki.content: Rapper Che Smith, who goes by the stage name Rhymefest, wrote this song with West. The main sample came from a gospel song by a choir of reformed drug addicts in New York. (Source Jesus Walks Songfacts) User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Rapper Che Smith, who goes by the stage name Rhymefest, wrote this song with West. The main sample came from a gospel song by a choir of reformed drug addicts in New York. (Source Jesus Walks Songfacts)
